thread.title: Time changed for Husker game this Saturday
thread.title_full: Time changed for Husker game this Saturday

title: Time changed for Husker game this Saturday
text:
Time changed for Husker game this Saturday UPDATED 12:06 PM CDT Oct 01, 2015 Photos 
The time for the Husker game has changed due to the impending weather impact of Hurricane Joaquin. Related 
The Michigan and Maryland game in College Park has been moved from 7 p.m. to 11 a.m. on BTN. 
Nebraska's game with Illinois will now kick off at 3:02 p.m. 
The time was delayed 20 minutes to accommodate any potential weather-related delays in earlier games Saturday.
